snippet.title: Wii Chess Trailer
snippet.description:
Please click (more) for details.

NO THIS GAME ISN'T WII WARE!* Instead its a budget title so thats £20/€30.

Oh well at least it has Wi-Fi play. It comes out in Europe on the 18th of January 2008. No date for Ameirca or Japan yet...considering you're getting Brawl soon and we have no date don't think you've gotten the rotten end of the stick.

I'm interested to see how well this sells but should have been Wii ware is a thought that crosses my mind.

*-Retrospective fun...the game is about to come out in Japan as World Chess and yes, they get it in on WiiWare for 1000 points and can play Wii Chess owners.
